title: Sky Ring
description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

title: Recoil
description: India's first-ever action-packed reverse looping roller coaster ride!

title: Mission Interstellar
description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

title: Equinox
description: A thrill monster that rotates 360 degrees in a group of 3!

title: Space Gun
description: See the world upside-down, dangling from high up above the ground!

title: Y-Scream
description: Strap in tight to swing, spin and scream on this dizzying 360-degree thrill fest!

title: G Fall
description: Brace yourself for a heart-pounding, high-speed plunge into a dizzying freefall!

title: Flash Tower
description: Experience a thrilling free-fall from a dizzying height!

title: Crazy Cars
description: Bump and zoom around the arena in these crazy, fun-filled cars!

title: Mushroom Coaster
description: A gentle and fun roller coaster ride perfect for the little ones!

title: Pirate Ship
description: Swing back and forth on a giant pirate ship for a classic thrill!

title: Wonder Splash
description: Plunge down a steep water slide into a refreshing splash pool!

title: Dungeon Ride
description: Brave the dark depths of the dungeon in this spooky ride!

title: Mini Pirate Ship
description: A smaller version of the classic pirate ship, perfect for kids!
